CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with its BT - based analogue PzNDTDTBT , the introduction of the stronger electron - accepting BO unit into PzNDTDTBO not only enhanced the intramolecular charge transfer in the conjugated polymer but also downshifted the HOMO energy level of the organic semiconductor , and as a result , BHJ solar cells incorporating blends of the PzNDTDTBO with PC71BM showed the PCE of 5.07% after device optimization such as adding additive and thermal annealing , while a PCE of 3.22% was obtained in PzNDTDTBT - based devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| BO unit |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PC71BM |

The paragraph mentions three material names explicitly: PzNDTDTBO, PzNDTDTBT, and PC71BM. The paragraph also mentions the introduction of a "stronger electron - accepting BO unit into PzNDTDTBO," but it's clear from context that BO is a unit or component of PzNDTDTBO, so it's included as a material name as well.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| BO unit (assumed to be a component or unit of PzNDTDTBO) |

The paragraph mentions three material names explicitly: PzNDTDTBO, PzNDTDTBT, and PC71BM. The paragraph also mentions the introduction of a "stronger electron - accepting BO unit into PzNDTDTBO," but it's not clear if BO is a separate material or a component/unit of PzNDTDTBO. To maintain precision, it's included as a material name with the assumption that it's a component or unit of PzNDTDTBO.
